author: Ellie Bate
title: Lena Dunham Is Not Here For People Praising Her Weight Loss
text:
ID: 10720101 5. Headlines all over the world praised Lena for her â€œdramatic weight lossâ€, calling the change â€œshockingâ€ and â€œincredibleâ€ and encouraging readers to â€œcheck out her transformationâ€. View this image â€º

instagram.com ID: 10720139 7. In an Instagram post thanking Refinery29 for publishing an article titled â€œPeople Need To Stop Talking About Lena Dunhamâ€™s Weightâ€, she explained why she rejects the claim that her weight loss is â€œa triumphâ€: View this image â€º 
Instagram / instagram.com ID: 10720149 8. â€œMy weight loss isnâ€™t a triumph and it also isnâ€™t some sign Iâ€™ve finally given in to the voices of trolls,â€ she wrote . â€œBecause my body belongs to ME â€“ at every phase, in every iteration, and whatever Iâ€™m doing with it.â€ Loading View on Instagram 
Instagram: @lenadunham â€œI refuse to celebrate these bullshit before-and-after pictures,â€ Lena continued. â€œDonâ€™t we have infinitely more pressing news to attend to?â€
